alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Kohala; Kona; Lanai Leeward; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 30 at 3:45AM HST until January 31 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND FOR WEST FACING SHORES OF LANAI AND THE BIG ISLAND UNTIL 6 PM HST WEDNESDAY... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI THROUGH 6 PM HST WEDNESDAY... .A NW swell will produce advisory to near warning level surf today through tonight. This swell will then gradually diminish on Wednesday. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Surf building to 18 to 22 feet along north facing shores, and 12 to 18 along most west facing shore except for surf 7 to 10 feet along west facing shores of the Big Island. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, and Molokai. West facing shores of Lanai and the Big island. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.

area.areaDesc: Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Kohala; Kona; Lanai Leeward; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast
